channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
ok well i have a server whitch isent that bad...but theres a few things i need.
1.i think my commands are in the client cause i cant find a doc named commands...and if they are can i just make a new one named commands?
2. were do i download the command maker.
3. people in my server keep restarting after we restart the server....is there a way to save there char files?
4.can somone add me on msn? so if i get stuck i could ask some questions..... trivium4bodom@hotmail.com
thanks guys :)

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

YAY im loved XD

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

no its not,

in client, look for something like this.

appendPos();

under it add

smitimer -= 1;
if(smitimer <= 1)
{
savechar();
println_debug("Auto saved game.");
savemoreinfo();
println_debug("Auto saving moreinfo file...");
if(savemoreinfo())
{
println_debug("Successfuly auto saved moreinfo file.");
attempts = 0;
smitimer = 600;
}
else if(!savemoreinfo() && attempts <= 5)
{
println_debug("Error saving moreinfo file! Retrying in 5 seconds");
println_debug("Attempts: "+attempts);
attempts += 1;
smitimer = 5;
}
else if(!savemoreinfo() && attempts >= 5)
{
println_debug("Attempts: "+attempts+" - Giving up saving moreinfo file!");
attempts += 1;
smitimer = 99999999;
}
}

this is the auto save.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @wasabiie wasabiie
item.description:
@wasabiie wrote:

yes please. but how do i look for the log out section? do i just serch “logout” and put it under there?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2007, 02:13:46 PM[/size][hr]i really need to know were to put that…is it in the player save file? it just does an error when i try it.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

ok. for number 3
serch for the place in your client where people log out.
there add these two things

savechar();
savemoreinfo();

that saves chars when you log.

would you like an auto save?
